name: Prosciutto and Taleggio Sandwich With Fig Preserves From 'Extra Virgin: Recipes and Love From Our Tuscan Kitchen'
description: Debi Mazar calls this this sandwich from her new cookbook, Extra Virgin: Recipes and Love from our Tuscan Kitchen, co-written with husband Gabriele Corcos, "sexy." And there is something a little sultry about how the salty, fat-licked prosciutto, the funky cheese, the bracing radicchio, and the sweet fig jam come together.
recipeIngredient: Extra virgin olive oil, for brushing

recipeInstructions.text: Heat a medium cast iron skillet or grill pan over medium heat.

Spread the bottom half of each ciabatta piece with 1 tablespoon fig preserves. Top with one-half of the Taleggio, prosciutto, and radicchio. Close with the top slice of bread and brush the outside of the sandwich with the olive oil.
Place each sandwich in the pan and press with a flat, heavy lid or sandwich press until the cheese is just melted.
Remove from the heat, slice in half, and serve.
